messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Bestlizards > Smelly Humans, please stand-by.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Alec Cossstello challenged me to combat for title of captain, I sssaw thisss asss a chance to asssert my dominance, It wasss bat vsss bat. He hasss dissshonourably usssed corked wood. Can you sssend a rep down to talk about thisss dissshonour in the face of Nano?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Bestlizards > Smelly Humans's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Emergency Storage.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Morgue.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Denise Wilkinson. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Recent reports show Syndicate Activity on the station which may result in the destruction of the entire station as we know it. We're sending in the big boys to combat this. If you are part of the crew, we suggest you stay inside your departments and let them do their routine sweep.
